name: My Human's Nightmare
description: My Human’s Nightmare is a 3-Dimension; First-Person Shooter (FPS) game with an emphasis on exploration, collecting items and upgrades. The player controls Alice, a survival horror FPS. As Alice, players must run, avoid, and kill enemies in the game’s world. Alice is required to go through different obstacles by interacting with the environment by solving puzzles, unlocking doors, and killing various enemies to escape the nightmare.
